articles.content: Sunil Gavaskar has written an aggressive riposte to Nasser Hussain’s comment that India were a ‘nice’ team before Sourav Ganguly’s appointment as captain. (File Photo/AP)Sunil Gavaskar has lashed out… [+1894 chars]

articles.description: Ajinkya Rahane was named the captain of the team in the important match against Australia 2017. Recalling the moment, the batsman said that it was a special occasion for him to lead the Indian troops in the longest format.

articles.description: The Frenchman is out with a muscle injury
articles.content:
Antoine Griezmann is expected to miss at least three weeks due to the quadriceps injury he picked up against Real Valladolid on Saturday.
